Text: E̩ ki la dibetʼe̩ne̩ ki nyi we̩ o̩jo̩ okolobia-we̩, o̩gba tak iko e̩bie̩ne̩ ki wa, kʼo̩do̩ e̩gba kʼuwe̩ akakini, “U nʼube̩do̩ ef uwñ n” mute wa;
o̩gba tak olu kpʼugane̩ kpʼochu kpʼilawo chane̩ echubi kʼomi lo̩ kʼakpa mudabiwa;
o̩jo̩ kʼo̩la amadide unyi chane̩ ega, kʼamagbiti adʼoji lo̩, kʼabobule̩ ku ma no̩ e̩wñ we enʼe̩wñ, ukpe̩ leu ma bo̩ re ofo, kʼabo ku ma nyʼope gʼo̩do̩da chubi;
kʼama fʼalu o̩na ojukpologu re; kʼekuku e̩wñ eno̩ bo̩ re, kʼone̩ akwane̩ todu omuko̩la e̩we̩ kʼi agbo̩, ku ma fʼamo̩ma onobule̩ ku ma keli chi ukata;

ochochi, ama ño̩ railo e̩wñ ki dʼatate̩; e̩wñ okpo la jʼej o̩na; tak oli almond adikoko; kʼakpachi la chʼadu, kʼeñeju e̩wñ ma de̩ ge̩ n; todabu kʼone̩ anyʼunyi-wñ ki chʼogbegbele̩, oñ abo ku ma deku tale ej o̩na ej o̩na;
o̩gba tak iku ajifa le̩ muko̩da, abe̩k otube̩ o̩jamalia mukpo̩-fo̩, abe̩k o̩cha kpo̩fo̩ alu e̩bi omi, abe̩k injini ku ma du kpʼomiofo mukpabie̩ alu obuga,
tak ebutu mudabi tʼane̩pe̩te̩ ugbo kʼi de̩ akwoubi, kʼafu la mudabi tʼugbo O̩jo̩ kʼi dʼu wa.
O̩wai e-o̩wai, Ako̩la ñw ujeju ka-i; e̩wñ du chʼo̩wai.
Ubi le̩ ge̩ abu kʼAko̩la ñw ujeju le̩ chenʼibe, i ño̩ ko̩ amone̩ e̩wñ ibe ema ge̩. I nakpibe̩, i kwotejane̩, i la fʼita ita wewe te̩ru jo̩.
Ako̩la ñw ujeju le̩ kwotejane̩ o̩la ki abe̩do̩, kpʼe̩wñ ku ma ko̩ tʼo̩kpakpa, owñ chʼo̩la ochochi.
O̩la amanibe dab ebije ku ma du gwunyʼofe kʼokuno̩ kʼi lule̩, eyajo̩-wñ la dab ale ku ma fuka nyʼe̩wñ kpaka: adidala okate ko wa.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, o̩ma-mi, e̩ ki je̩ ñwu ma kʼuwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la; o̩takada etito̩ e̩che̩ i nʼuda n, oñ e̩wñ eko̩che̩ ololo agwʼo̩re̩la uhia.
Ukpoji o̩la-i chaka de̩; a fʼe̩wñ du gbo̩ me̩; railo O̩jo̩, kʼe̩ fʼuko̩ uko̩ kʼi te̩ de; todu e-ki chʼo̩gbodudu e̩wñ e-one̩de̩.
Todu O̩jo̩ adʼuko̩lo̩ okoke du wʼef ajo̩, i chaka chʼe̩wñ du ki maja, dagba i nyo̩ dagba i bie̩ne̩.
